TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UILayoutPriority extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of values used by flow layouts to prioritize constraints.

remarks.para: Higher values are considered more important by the flow layout constraint engine. Application developers should not specify a layout priority greater than the value of

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UILayoutPriority DefaultHigh = int32(750)

Docs.summary: The resistance by which a button resists compressing its content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UILayoutPriority DefaultLow = int32(250)

Docs.summary: The priority at which a button hugs its content horizontally.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UILayoutPriority FittingSizeLevel = int32(50)

Docs.summary: Generally not used; the priority at which a view wants to conform to the value of UIView.SystemLayoutSizeFitting.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UILayoutPriority Required = int32(1000)

Docs.summary: Indicates a required constraint. The underlying value of this is 1000.
